job_description.purpose: At Floor and Decor we believe purchasing flooring or your materials for your next big project should be a fun and frictionless experience. The Ecommerce Content Director is responsible for driving the content strategies that empower our multiple customer types with the confidence to purchase by building content rich strategies that lead to informative, inspirational, SEO optimized and conversion driving assets.
key_responsibilities: Conceptualizes, develops, and oversees the implementation of content to increase organic awareness, earn the trust of our customer and boost online sales and/or support store sales
Develops and execute social proofing strategies while managing direct reports in day-to-day responsibilities
Works closely with Merchant teams to ensure trends and product strategies align with in store and product execution
Leads a team of product Q&A specialists to deliver exceptional customer experiences
minimum_requirements: 7-10+ years or more of digital content creation required
Experience with Ecommerce platforms and related supporting systems – Salesforce Commerce Cloud experience a plus
Working knowledge of content management systems (CMS), UGC platforms, and product Q&A platforms
Experience developing digital content with a SEO focused lens
Advanced excel knowledge a must, Power BI and Google Analytics experience preferred
Proven track record of building and managing cross functional processes
Managing direct reports and building best in class teams
benefits_offered: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life and other Insurance Plans

working_conditions.travel_required: Limited travel required including air and car travel
working_conditions.work_environment: Occasionally exposed to warehouse environment and moving vehicles
working_conditions.physical_requirements: Sedentary work – sitting most of the time with brief periods of walking/standing

field_definitions.company_name: Official company name as it appears on LinkedIn company page
field_definitions.salary_range_min: Minimum salary in specified currency (no commas)
field_definitions.salary_range_max: Maximum salary in specified currency (no commas)
field_definitions.notes: Personal observations and strategic insights (always blank initially)
field_definitions.job_description: Structured job description with purpose, responsibilities, requirements, benefits, and working conditions

inference_flags.purpose: Track which fields were directly extracted vs intelligently inferred

values.false: Data directly extracted from job posting
values.true: Data inferred through web research or intelligent analysis
